java/liquibase/change/RenameViewChange.java

00001 package liquibase.change;
00002 
00003 import liquibase.database.Database;
00004 import liquibase.database.sql.RenameViewStatement;
00005 import liquibase.database.sql.SqlStatement;
00006 import liquibase.database.structure.DatabaseObject;
00007 import liquibase.database.structure.View;
00008 import liquibase.exception.UnsupportedChangeException;
00009 import org.w3c.dom.Document;
00010 import org.w3c.dom.Element;
00011 
00012 import java.util.Arrays;
00013 import java.util.HashSet;
00014 import java.util.Set;
00015 
00019 public class RenameViewChange extends AbstractChange {
00020     private String schemaName;
00021     private String oldViewName;
00022     private String newViewName;
00023 
00024     public RenameViewChange() {
00025         super("renameView", "Rename View");
00026     }
00027 
00028     public String getSchemaName() {
00029         return schemaName;
00030     }
00031 
00032     public void setSchemaName(String schemaName) {
00033         this.schemaName = schemaName;
00034     }
00035 
00036     public String getOldViewName() {
00037         return oldViewName;
00038     }
00039 
00040     public void setOldViewName(String oldViewName) {
00041         this.oldViewName = oldViewName;
00042     }
00043 
00044     public String getNewViewName() {
00045         return newViewName;
00046     }
00047 
00048     public void setNewViewName(String newViewName) {
00049         this.newViewName = newViewName;
00050     }
00051 
00052     public SqlStatement[] generateStatements(Database database) throws UnsupportedChangeException {
00053         return new SqlStatement[]{new RenameViewStatement(getSchemaName() == null?database.getDefaultSchemaName():getSchemaName(), getOldViewName(), getNewViewName())};
00054     }
00055 
00056     protected Change[] createInverses() {
00057         RenameViewChange inverse = new RenameViewChange();
00058         inverse.setOldViewName(getNewViewName());
00059         inverse.setNewViewName(getOldViewName());
00060 
00061         return new Change[]{
00062                 inverse
00063         };
00064     }
00065 
00066     public String getConfirmationMessage() {
00067         return "View " + oldViewName + " renamed to " + newViewName;
00068     }
00069 
00070     public Element createNode(Document currentChangeLogFileDOM) {
00071         Element element = currentChangeLogFileDOM.createElement(getTagName());
00072         if (getSchemaName() != null) {
00073             element.setAttribute("schemaName", getSchemaName());
00074         }
00075         element.setAttribute("oldViewName", getOldViewName());
00076         element.setAttribute("newViewName", getNewViewName());
00077 
00078         return element;
00079     }
00080 
00081     public Set<DatabaseObject> getAffectedDatabaseObjects() {
00082         View oldView = new View();
00083         oldView.setName(oldViewName);
00084 
00085         View newView = new View();
00086         newView.setName(newViewName);
00087 
00088         return new HashSet<DatabaseObject>(Arrays.asList(oldView, newView));
00089     }
00090 
00091 }
